name: @andrei-tatar/node-red-contrib-mppsolar-mpi-15kw
description: MPP Solar Inverter MPI 15KW WP integration for node-red

scripts.build: tsc && cp src/nodes/*.html dist/nodes/ && cp -r src/nodes/icons dist/nodes/icons
scripts.pub: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ --access=public

author: Andrei Tatar
